tasks.label: force:auth:web:login
tasks.description: Authorizes a Salesforce org by opening a browser so you can log in through salesforce.com.

tasks.label: force:auth:web:login:setdefaultusername
tasks.description: Sets the authenticated org as the default username that all commands run against

tasks.label: force:apex:test:codecoverage
tasks.description: Warning: It will run all test. retrieve code coverage results

tasks.label: force:apex:test:codecoverage:list
tasks.description: Get Result only: the code coverage for the apex classes/triggers
tasks.command: sfdx force:data:soql:query -t -q "SELECT ApexClassOrTriggerId,ApexClassOrTrigger.Name,NumLinesCovered,NumLinesUncovered FROM ApexCodeCoverageAggregate ORDER BY ApexClassOrTrigger.Name" --resultformat ${select:soql_result_format}

tasks.description: Exports data from this org into sObject tree format for force:data:tree:import consumption.

tasks.description: Exports data from an authorized org into sObject tree format for force:data:tree:import consumption.

tasks.label: force:data:tree:import
tasks.description: Imports data into this org using the SObject Tree Save API. This data can include master-detail relationships.

tasks.description: Imports data into an authorized org using the SObject Tree Save API. This data can include master-detail relationships.
